description.p: Action Javascript, Client-side Templates, and Alpha Anywhere's built-in JavaScript libraries.

item.name: [Action Javascript]
item.description: Javascript actions available in Alpha Anywhere.

item.name: [Client API]
item.description: JavaScript classes as methods that run on the client (web browser of mobile device) as well as a complete reference for Client-side templates.

description.p: A reference for Xbasic, including the Xbasic Language, Desktop API functions and methods for working with Xdialog, and Server-side objects, namespaces, functions, and classes.

item.name: [Xbasic Language Reference]
item.description: A reference for the Xbasic Language.

item.name: [Desktop API References]
item.description: Functions and Objects that apply to desktop application written using Xdialog.

item.name: [Xbasic Function Finder]
item.description: Use the Xbasic Function Finder to search the list of available Xbasic functions in Alpha Anywhere by name.

link.link: api xbasic api xbasic language reference index
